name: Shortage of Space
description:
A lot of villains - but a shortage of space. No single soul remembers how and when The War started. You, general, together with your fleet of the best warriors in the galaxy carry the responsibility to bring justice once and for all.

Multi-platform space shooter RTS.

How can you join us on this adventure? After opening the game you are greeted with the main menu. You can either see your 'Fleet' (Meaning all the ships you can deploy during battle, or you can start your journey right away.

The CORE Idea is that you have some amount of troops to deploy and you have to think of a way to deploy them so that you manage to kill the big red vacuum cleaner that invaded your galaxy. 

You select which troop to deploy and then click once again in space to deploy it.

You can zoom in and zoom out using the mouse scroll wheel, and move the camera using  W, A, S, D.

You have healers, fighters and tanks. More information regarding each one of them and their backstories can be found in the 'Fleet' menu.

Minimum System Requirements:
Intel i3 4th generation; Intel HD 620 and above; 2GB RAM;
Operating System: Windows, Linux or Mac

17 March: Fixed some bugs with the ships' behavior and tuned some stats for better and a bit longer experience during the demo level. Enjoy :)
